location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: The gazette is publishing a General Order issued by the Governor General of India announcing the capture, and occupation of the city of Pegu [Bago, Myanmar] on 21 November 1852. It also contains published dispatches from Commodore George Robert Lambert, and Major General Henry Thomas Godwin; these dispatches report on the operation to capture the town. This includes a memorandum on the strength of the force employed, commendations for named officers, along with returns for the killed and wounded.
